channel.title: General Travel Awesome Work Phoenix Insanity on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in General Travel Awesome Work Phoenix Insanity on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: phoenix is rather nice
item.description: the weather here is excellent. i likey. work is fun. the environment here is much more “low-key” than in chicago. the people are just as nice but everyone seems so much more chill. it is a great work vacation. i think they should send everyone here to recooooop. it rules. oh and it is really nice out. just yesterday i got sunburned. which isn’t exactly hard for me - since i get color walking to the train.
